name: Discovery | Guess | Profile
description: Not find profile in Profile Check Rules
body_template: Not find profile in Profile Check Rules for managed object {{alarm.managed_object.name}} (IP: {{alarm.managed_object.address}}).
symptoms: Error in response device SA profile
probable_causes: Not find profile for OID or HTTP response or wrong SNMP community in device settings
recommended_actions: View having prfoile check rules for device
